biotools.summary:
Shortcuts for faster image creation in PyMOL.

The repository pymolschortucts contains a collection of shortcuts that are loaded on startup of PyMOL. These shortcuts enable web searches from within PyMOL as well as many other convenient functions that make work in PyMOL more productive.

bioschemas.name: PyMOL
